content.about:
Shenasi Carpet provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Persian Oriental antique rugs  
- Expertise: Material analysis knot density origin identification age verification design authenticity  
- Certifications: Over 40 years experience certified reports accepted internationally[^1][^6][^10]
- Contact: +1 (604) XXX. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Vancouver area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Michael J.
reviews.content: Shenasi Carpet's knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Jennifer C.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: David W.
reviews.content: Knowledgeable about antiques, though communication could have been better during the process.

reviews.content: Knowledgeable about antiques, though communication could have been better during the process.

content.about: Vancouver Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Vancouver area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: John W.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: Jennifer A.
reviews.content: Good service overall, though the turnaround time for my antique appraisal was longer than expected.
